using namespace std;
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define SLL(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d",x)
#define fl(i , a, b) for(i = (int)a; i<(int)b; i++)
#define mem(a , value) memset(a , value , sizeof(a))
#define tr(c, itr) for(itr = (c).begin(); itr != (c).end(); itr++)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 1000000010
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
int a[1234567];
int main()
{
	//std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t , i, n , j , s ,check ,diff;
	S(t);
	w(t)
	{
		cin>>n;
		s =0 ; 
		fl(i , 0 , n )
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			s+=a[i];
		}
		int f= 0; 
		for(i =0 ; i <= 3000 ; i++)
		{
			check = 2*i + (n-1) ; 
			check = check*n ;  
			if(check%2==0 && (check/2)==s )
			{
				f=1 ; break ; 
			}
		}
		if(f==0){
			printf("-1\n");
		}
		else{
			diff =0 ; 
			for( j =0 ; j < n ;j++)
			{
				diff+= abs( i - a[j]);
				i++;
			}
			printf("%d\n" , diff/2);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
